Welcome to the FloatCanvas Demo!

Welcome to the FloatCanvas demo! This demo features a tutorial part where you can learn about all areas of FloatCanvas ranging from installation instructions to creating simple drawings and using many of the advanced features. A lot of the examples come with example code and you can view the code being executed live!

The tree on the left is used for navigation while this panel here and the tabs right over it are used for navigation inside a specific example.


And now... Enjoy! :-)



Chris and Matt
